name: Str.at.e.s. 1: Match-A-Batch
overview: Str.at.e.s. 1: Match a Batch is an Educational game where you learn through the adventures of four students who are given time travel powers, it is intended to teach history, reading comprehension and to increase vocabulary while immersing the student in an interactive exploration adventure. It was developed and published by Lightspan, which was released in 1998.
